# Crypto Trading Advisor Project

## Project Overview
A professional Python-based crypto trading advisor for KuCoin with CLI interface, technical analysis, and trading recommendations.

## Tech Stack
- Python 3.8+
- ccxt (KuCoin API)
- pandas, numpy (data analysis)
- python-dotenv (environment management)

## Development Guidelines
- Follow PEP 8 style guidelines
- Use type hints where appropriate
- Keep functions modular and well-documented
- Handle API errors gracefully
- Respect KuCoin rate limits
